name: STASIS (itch) (WhReen, mythicalcat2, ShmegMayn, lompatkodoksss, DeaconBeacon)
description:
"We all never asked to be born into this world. 

And yet, we all did.

It’s fate.

Every victory we made, every defeat we suffer, It’s all according to fate.

It sits us down, feeds us the things we never ask and the things we don’t always want. Then forces us to work for it.

All kneel down before it.

But some, despite all he knows, woke up every single day, tries to fight it back, against all he knows."

Controls:

WASD/ArrowKeys = Move&Jump

SPACE = Jump

E/C = Interact

Z/J/MouseLeft = Slash Attack

X/K/MouseRight = Stasis Gun

Credits:

Ahmad Haydar Alkaf (DeaconBeacon) as Lead Artist, Game Designer, Music
